summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission works to protect investors and maintain fair, orderly, and efficient securities markets. To do so, it needs to attract and retain a high-quality workforce. SEC has strengthened its personnel management practices in workforce planning and other areas, but it has not implemented our 2013 recommendation to validate its performance management system by obtaining staff input and agreement on key aspects...
title: Securities and Exchange Commission: Personnel Management Shows Improvement, but Action Needed on Performance Management System
